Our apartment is right above Bilbao Berria, so it was convenient for us when we did not want to trek out to our favorite spot. They offer decent pinchos at fair prices, including little mini paella and dessert pinchos all for the same price. Staff can be hit or miss. The guy standing t the door all bouncer like is pretty surly and not very welcoming. There are many options in the area, but we found this to be a good choice for the price and quality.
